A "new" version of PeerGuardian might be nice if the fuckers at Blocklist.org ever updated their lists. They haven't updated since the end of 2006 as far as I know. Safepeer uses the same list, so it's just as outdated.

Oh, and Azureus only "sucks power" from wimpy computers. I use it and don't have any problems at all with multitasking or whatever I choose to do while it's running. Highly recommended in my opinion, if you want total control over everything.

i think this is the version which also works on vista there are bugs but hey it works :D
all u have to do is set pg to log all connections and show them and update the list, you should see the updates logged if not close pg and try again.
